content: *this pattern is worked flat and seamed together to form the finished hat lion brand yarn * skill level beginner level 1 crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm pom pom maker matching scarf can be found at berry bloom hat and scarf scarf /patterns/library/berry-bloom-hat-and-scarf-scarf hat in this pattern uses slightly different chain length with same pattern but makes same size hat with same size hook as this pattern available under different names and in different yarns and colorways wool ease thick & quick /yarns/library/lion-brand-wool-ease-thick--quick 70490ad crochet hat 1 2005 80948ad spring fling crocheted hat 2 2005 80948b spring fling crocheted hat 3 2009 80949ad autumn harvest crocheted hat 4 2009 hometown usa /yarns/library/lion-brand-hometown-usa midnight hat 5 2009 key lime hat 6 2009 90290b apple pie hat 7 2009 90290c apple pie hat 8 2009 90290ad apple pie hat 9 2009 80964ad starboard hat 11 is similar but uses double strand of aran yarn *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70490ad html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-spring-fling-hat-2 3 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-spring-fling-hat-3 4 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-autumn-harvest-hat-1 5 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-midnight-hat-1 _pos=1&_sid=105d9c454&_ss=r 6 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-key-lime-hat-1 7 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-apple-pie-hat-4 8 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-apple-pie-hat-5 9 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-apple-pie-hat-3 10 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/apple-pie-hat 11 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/starboard-hat
